column2:
"<%me>!
I have been waiting for you. Please, let me see what you have found."
"This is excellent! The weight and hardness are simply perfect, and the clear blue color is quite beautiful!"

"これは、素晴らしいです！
硬さも重さもちょうどいいですし
透き通った青も、とてもきれい！"

"Hmm, on closer inspection, does this not look like...
No, surely it must be my imagination."
"I know my brother will adore the drinking glasses I make of this. Thank you very much, Guardian."
